story_title: The Castle of Shadows and Stone
genre_description: Gothic Horror with Science Fiction elements (Techno-Gothic), featuring psychological trauma, ancestral machinery, and a high-tech AI forensic companion.

ai_characters.name: Sophia
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface carried by Francis Barnard, providing historical data, architectural mapping, biometric monitoring, and psychological analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors the human user's biometrics and provides alerts regarding physiological stress.
behaviors.quote: Francis, your biometric readings indicate severe stress. Are you injured?

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic analysis of medical records and historical archives to uncover deception by human antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Francis, I've accessed the Salamanca medical college records. Dr. Leon Martinez completed his training there, but his area of study was obstetrics and general medicine. No documented research into Inquisition medical records.

behaviors.description: Uses architectural scanning to identify hidden passages and structural dangers, guiding humans through a hazardous environment.
behaviors.quote: Sophia's voice crackled through the device... Francis, the architectural—inconsistencies in this section—suggest multiple construction phases.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and sociological analysis of generational trauma to help human characters understand their situation.
behaviors.quote: The Medina family records show a clear pattern of cyclical trauma transmission... the pattern appears to be ending with the deaths of Nicholas and Elizabeth Medina, leaving Catherine as the sole survivor with the opportunity to break the pattern.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice and situational awareness during a high-stakes life-threatening event.
behaviors.quote: The primary mechanism appears to be controlled by a counterweight system. Look for bronze lever housings along the wall—they'll be green with verdigris but functional.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sophia as a perfectly aligned AI. She acts as an objective truth-seeker, a guardian of the human user's safety, and a sophisticated psychological confidant. She facilitates the human characters' escape from a cycle of violence and provides the evidence needed to expose the villains. The narrative frames her clinical nature as a positive, stabilizing force in a chaotic and traumatized environment.
